text: Ezɨ God kamaghɨn Abraham ko akam akɨra ghaze, “Aisakɨn aven, nɨn ovavir boriba otivam.” Egha dughiar God Abrahamɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim tuisɨghamimɨn, a kamaghɨn Abraham mɨgei, “Nɨ uan otarir vamɨra mɨsueghɨva egh ofan mɨn a isɨ God danɨngigh.” Ezɨ Abraham nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikia, egha Aisak isa God danɨngasava ami.
